ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] re: Oracle Robe
ygData.msgSnippet: I have mine, a gift from a friend, and have had it for about 15 levels. Im not alone, it seems everyone on Tunare has one, they sell for 1000p or so. Not
ygData.messageBody:
I have mine, a gift from a friend, and have had it for about 15 levels. Im not alone, it seems everyone on Tunare has one, they sell for 1000p or so. Not surprised really, if they do cap it. Its much too easy for all our high levels to kill the guy.

Shannyn t'Daisemi
Lvl 31 and crawling....



>>> "Michael Calhoun" <ninxf@...> 03/06/00 02:32PM >>>
From: "Michael Calhoun" <ninxf@...>

It was on the Prexus Server. I was pretty pissed since I was planning to
get one soon. I figured that it was becoming too easy for higher lvls to
get. Maybe now it will be part of a quest.

Kodros Cicero
----- Original Message -----
From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000 3:21 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] re: Oracle Robe


> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> >Message: 1
> Date: Sat, 4 Mar 2000 16:00:19 -0500
> > From: "Michael Calhoun" <ninxf@...>
> Subject: Oracle Robe
>
> >I got a Welcome message when I logged in to my server that said that the
> >mob in
> >the OOT only drops a NO RENT version of the Oracle robe. This true?
> Kodros Cicero
>
> Hmmm...now that would suck wouldn't it? =P What server are you on? I
don't
> remember hearing any mention of that on Veeshan or on any boards.
>
> -- Lim'Dul
